mapper.select: select a.country_id,active_cnt,round(a.active_cnt*1.0/b.tot_act_cnt,2) as ratio from ( select country_id, count() as active_cnt from haylou_datawares.dwd_usr_app_active_dt_dfs where pdate >= toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -1)))) and pdate < toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(now()))) group by country_id order by active_cnt desc limit 5 ) a, ( select count() as tot_act_cnt from haylou_datawares.dwd_usr_app_active_dt_dfs where pdate >= toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(addMonths(now(), -1)))) and pdate < toString(toYYYYMMDD(toStartOfMonth(now()))) ) b order by active_cnt desc
